Articles.Content:
I have been requested to make a sub-thread-forum-thingy in the Mission Reports to record this Epic, really long and boring journey.

So, without further ado, I bring to you lovely people........

THE ELCANO CHALLENGE: BOB_SAGET54 EDITION

For this challenge, you need to take a rover, boat, or combination of both and travel around the world by any route you choose, except through the air. My entry was a boat that is capable of a max speed of 80 meters per second with over 1200 units of fuel.

BE WARNED:

This journey will be extremely boring, with lots of water, boating, and some sad moments to go along with it.

Follow at your own risk!

(JK, but I am not kidding about the boring part)

Post will be updated daily with new legs and developments.

Leg I - The Adventure begins!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Leg II - Floating Water and Generous Jeb

Javascript is disabled. View full album

NOTICE: I am aware that the Kerbal in the scout plane is NOT Jebidiah. That will be fixed in Leg III.

Edited April 24, 2015 by Bob_Saget54
Leg 2 is now up, following up shortly with Leg 3
